title: Colt Canyon
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Colt Canyon is a pixel art rogue-lite shooter where you have to save your kidnapped partner from the ruthless bandits. Shoot your way through a hostile canyon full of hidden treasures, weapons, obstacles and all kinds of bloodthirsty scum.
